Levels.green: Breath-in of the mock block of the breath holding task (BHT)
Levels.yellow: Breath-out of the mock block of BHT
Levels.light-green: The last breath-in of the mock block in BHT is highlighted by a lighter green.
Levels.gold: The last breath-in of the mock block in BHT is highlighted by a different shade of yellow.
Levels.red: Breath-hold of the mock block in BHT
Levels.lighred: 2 last seconds of breath-hold in the mock block of BHT
Levels.end-message: Message annoucing end of the mock block in the BHT
Levels.in-last: Last breath-in of a BHT block
Levels.out-last: Last breath-out of a BHT block
Levels.hold-warning: The last 2 seconds of breath-hold are highlighted with a lighter shade.
Levels.refractory: The participant can breath freely to recuperate.

value.Description: Extra information needed to fully characterize the event

Levels.n/a: Not-available, value is not set for the trial type
